1.12.2.0.7.14:
Fix the sorting button for the player inventory stacking non-stackable items, and destroying items because of that
Fix some actions not working if keybinds are bound to mouse keys
1.12.2.0.7.13: Several bug fixes and small improvements
1.12.2.0.7.12: Several bug fixes and small improvements
1.12.2.0.7.11:
Fix a crash in the Nullifier model with Forge 2718+
Fix/change: The nullifier doesn't consume the items in Cretive mode anymore
1.12.2.0.7.10:
Fixed a signed Pet Contract getting destroyed when created from a stack of just one unsigned contract
Changed the Pet Contract to use an event handler, to prevent the normal interaction
Added a config whitelist for setting the valid "bedrock" blocks for an Energy Bridge
1.12.2.0.7.9:
Fixed several bugs, including the Handy Bag and Creation Station crafting grids not working with staged recipes
Improved/fixed a few tooltips and descriptions
Changed the Handy Bag to store the restock and pickup modes per Memory Card
Ender Furnace now only allows inputting smeltable items from the top
1.12.2.0.7.8:
Add a Pet Contract item
Add camo ability to the Barrel
Add Portal type Link Crystals, allowing Portals to be "paired"
Fix/improve some Drawbridge retraction/extension logic issues
Fix camo model overlays on items (elevators)
Fix some items always eating the keybinds even when they don't have any
Update some registrations to new Forge events
1.12.2.0.7.7:
Fix a crash with item pickups due to a Forge change
Add a void upgrade to the Barrel
1.12.2.0.7.6: Fix a crash with the camouflage block models when breaking camouflaged blocks with certain camo blocks/models
1.12.2.0.7.5: Added a redstone mode option to the Drawbridges
1.12.2.0.7.4:
Added top-half Ender Elevator slabs & layers
Improved the camouflage model stuff, it should now work with more blocks
A few small bugfixes

1.12.1.0.7.6: Fix a crash with the camouflage block models when breaking camouflaged blocks with certain camo blocks/models
1.12.1.0.7.5: Added a redstone mode option to the Drawbridges
1.12.1.0.7.4:
Added top-half Ender Elevator slabs & layers
Improved the camouflage model stuff, it should now work with more blocks
A few small bugfixes

1.12.0.7.6: Fix a crash with the camouflage block models when breaking camouflaged blocks with certain camo blocks/models
1.12.0.7.5: Added a redstone mode option to the Drawbridges
1.12.0.7.4:
Added top-half Ender Elevator slabs & layers
Improved the camouflage model stuff, it should now work with more blocks
A few small bugfixes
1.12.0.7.3:
Fix a possible crash with the Inserter and Portal Panel highlight boxes
Nullifier: Allow in items with NBT (like C&B bits), and improve the model (it can now render C&B bits for example)
Nullifier: Add Ctrl + middle clicking to empty/void slots
Inventory Swapper: Don't cycle/change card to empty slots using the hotkeys
1.12.0.7.2:
Change destroying blocks without spilling contents, again. Fixes some crashes with other modded TileEntities.
Possibly fix/prevent rare rendering/model related crashes
Fix the Nullifier model crashing with recent Forge versions
Fix the Inserter trying to get the target inventory on the wrong side
Fix Placement Properties syncing to clients not working when joining a server
1.12.0.7.1:
Updated for Forge 2373+
Small possible compatibility improvement to TileEntity creation from NBT (Dolly, Builder's Wand, Drawbridge etc.)
Fix the Ender Tools' harvest level being 0 due to recent item registration changes
Fix item tooltips not rendering in the Ender Infuser and Tool Workstation GUIs
Fix the Dolly's 3rd person model transformations
LMM: Update a relative rotation upon release
Various internal clean-up and changes (removed all SideOnly annotations for example)
1.12.0.7.0:
Ported to Minecraft 1.12
Some internal changes due to 1.12 and Forge changes

1.11.2.0.7.2:
Change destroying blocks without spilling contents, again. Fixes some crashes with other modded TileEntities.
Possibly fix/prevent rare rendering/model related crashes
1.11.2.0.7.1:
Added some missing TileEntity ID conversions if updating from 1.10.2
Added middle clicking in the player inventory in many of the mod GUIs in creative mode to get a full stack to the cursor, like in vanilla
Possibly fixed an inventory dupe with the Dolly, Drawbridge and the builder's wand
Plus a few small bug fixes
1.11.2.0.7.0:
Ported to Minecraft 1.11.2
More or less feature parity with 0.7.2 from 1.10.2, with some small improvements/additions

1.10.2.0.6.5: Ported the 0.6.5 release from MC 1.9.4 to 1.10.2
1.10.2.0.6.6:
Countless small improvements and bug fixes
Added some new modes to the Wand of the Lazy Builder
Added Paralyzer and Stimulant Syringes
1.10.2.0.6.7:
Fix a crash when trying to get a build item in the Wand of the Lazy Builder
Fix a crash with the Ender Elevator rotation methods
1.10.2.0.7.0: Added several new blocks and items, check the full changelog on the CurseForge files page
1.10.2.0.7.1:
Several bugfixes
Some improvements to the Drawbridge
Added camouflage ability to the Drawbridge, Elevators and Portal Frames
1.10.2.0.7.2:
Several bugfixes
Increased the maximum number of slots in the ASU to 27
1.10.2.0.7.3:
Added middle clicking in the player inventory in many of the mod GUIs in creative mode to get a full stack to the cursor, like in vanilla
Possibly fixed an inventory dupe with the Dolly, Drawbridge and the builder's wand
Plus a few small bug fixes
1.10.2.0.7.4:
Change destroying blocks without spilling contents, again. Fixes some crashes with other modded TileEntities.
Possibly fix/prevent rare rendering/model related crashes

1.9.4.0.6.5: Lots of changes/fixes, see the full changelog on the CurseForge files page
1.9.4.0.6.4:
Disabled the potion shift inside my GUIs
Handy Bag: Fixed the pickup-matching mode also looking inside the locked bag sections for matches
Handy Bag & Creation Station: Fixed slow and derpy mass crafting of items
Handy Chest & Creation Station: Ignore hotbar when moving matching items to chest
Ender Pearls: Some tweaks and minor fixes
Handy Chest: Fix an inventory init issue, that should't happen in normal game-play
Ender Elevator: Fix a derp with the redstone state checking
Living Matter Manipulator: Added special case support for Shulkers
Creation Station: Add cleaning up the crafting grid of left-over items after crafting - allows proper mass-crafting of things like Cake now
Builder's Wand: Changed the template file names to include the player name who first used the wand in the Copy mode
Builder's Wand: Added a toggle for advancing the position after placing the blocks, added some error messages to chat, and don't render the HUD if the chat is open
Handy Bag & Item Pickup Manager: Check for and ignore stacks with size 0
1.9.4.0.6.3:
Fix Handy Chest/Creation Station not storing items on Private mode Memory Cards
Add toggling item type Memory Card Public/Private mode by right clicking
Fix Ender Bag not showing capacitor charge in Ender Chest mode
Fix Portal activation logic was partially broken in 0.6.2
Handy Bag: Changed 'Move mathing items to bag' to exclude hotbar by default
Handy Bag: Changed the block-quick-actions state to be stored per Memory Card
Fix Ender Tools not requiring an Ender Core module when combined with Handy Bag item pickup
Builder'sa Wand: Removed block updates from Paste mode (pasting floating blocks is now possible)
Builder's Wand: change the mirroring, rotation and corners to be per-mode and per-template/area in Copy, Paste and Delete modes
Builder's Wand: Add Copy and Delete mode second position adjustment by shift + scrolling
Builder's Wand: Added an option to also delete entities in the Delete mode (creative-only)
Portal: Added config options to set the portal activation block search limits, plus increased the defaults
Portal Panel: Fixed a case where the selection box wouldn't update
Added a new extra-large variant of the Handy Chest
Refactored all hotkey/keybind things - scroll wheel doesn't pretend to be the Toggle key anymore, and in some cases they now do separate things
Added the ability to rename any items in the Tool Workstation
Added the ability to directly rename the Link Crystals in the Portal Panel GUI
Portal: Added a check to prevent repeated teleporting in some cases
Improved a few tooltips
1.9.4.0.6.2:
Fix a crash with the Portal Panel and running particles(!!)
Tweak the Portal Panel internal logic - multiple panels on one portal should work better now
Change several recipes, generally making things cheaper
1.9.4.0.6.1:
Add a chat message/warning if the Portal Scaler doesn't have enough charge for the teleport
Fix Portal Panel dropping with incorrect metadata
Add individual selection bounds and thus also proper detection for the Portal Panel buttons
Add new item: Cheaty Water Wand and a second variant of it, Super Cheaty Water Wand
1.9.4.0.6.0:
Ported the 0.6.0 release from MC 1.9 to MC 1.9.4.
Fixed some small rendering bugs.
Fixed a Mob Harness crash and another glitch.

1.9.0.6.1:
Fix a crash and another glitch with the Mob Harness
Fix a localization derp with the Ruler
Minor fixes to Portal Panel text rendering
1.9.0.6.0: Too many changes to list here - check the full changelog on the CurseForge file page.
1.9.0.5.3: Added sorting functionality/buttons to Handy Bag and Handy Chest
1.9.0.5.2:
Added a Quick Stacker item
Added Off hand slot support to the Inventory Swapper
Re-enabled the scaled stack size text rendering now that MCP has been fixed
Reduced the Ender Crystal spawn explosion strength
Added new chest models and textures
Fixed Ender Dragon boss bar got stuck when teleporting away from The End dimension
Added JEI recipe category crafting item support
Added support for the Forge update checker
1.9.0.5.1: Fix a couple of BlockState derps, which caused a crash with Optifine installed
1.9.0.5.0:
Port the 1.8.9-0.5.3 version to Minecraft 1.9
Changed various things to work with new 1.9 stuff like the dual wielding/off-hand stuff
Added some 1.9 sounds

1.8.9.0.5.6: Fix couldn't take items from the Ender Furnace output slot (and possibly some others) except via shift-clicking
1.8.9.0.5.5:
Fix Ender Tool recipes being mixed up
Fix a one block offset in negative coordinates when binding items using the Alt + Shift + Toggle key combo to include rotation
1.8.9.0.5.4:
Handy Bag: Fix an item loss bug on item pickup if the Handy Bag GUI is open
Fix required minimum Forge version
Fix/clean up some BlockState things
Add support for the Forge update checker
Add new chest models and textures
1.8.9.0.5.3:
Fixed a few Container/slotClick bugs
Fixed a nasty bug in the Ender Hoe crop planting code - it destroyed items from the inventory it was accessing
Fixed Ender Tools right click block place code not removing the stack when the size reaches 0
Fixed an item validity check in the Memory Chest, which resulted in losing the item in the cursor, when trying to manually swap stacks of different items, when there was a locked slot with free space for the item that was held in the cursor
Fixed Ender Bucket not applying the fluid color to the model
Changed the logic behind opening the Handy Bag. Now it shouldn't open "on its own" for example when browsing recipies in JEI if the originally opened inventory was the regular player inventory instead of the Handy Bag.
Changed the "Move all items (FROM the player inventory)" functionality to ignore the hotbar. In the Handy Bag GUI, you can still move everything, including the hotbar, by holding shift when clicking the button.
1.8.9.0.5.2:
Fix Handy Bag GUI buttons and slot backgrounds etc. being messed up with potion effects active
A couple of minor clean-ups/fixes to inventory/container things
1.8.9.0.5.1:
Fixed many item and block models being broken inside some of my inventory GUIs (the ones with scaled stack size rendering)
Fixed some recipies being wrong or missing in 0.5.0 (due to me being a derp and forgetting them while reorganizing some of the blocks...)
Fixed Ender Bow arrow requirement with some other mods (removed unnecessary events)
Updated JEI recipe area support for multiple areas in Creation Station
Changed all inventories from the old crappy IInventory into IItemHandler, and for TileEntities also into using capabilities with it
Thanks to IItemHandler, things like the Handy Chest are now accessible externally, for example by hoppers
The Ender Furnace also once again has support for large stacks, thanks to IItemHandler
Various small inventory/GUI related improvements and fixes, like shift + clicking target slot priorities etc.
Some miscellaneous small bug fixes
Known issues: shift + double clicking to move all matching items doesn't work properly because vanilla code doesn't understand SlotItemHandler type slots
1.8.9.0.5.0:
Update to Minecraft 1.8.9
Add JEI support to Creation Station
Add mod config gui factory (ie. main menu config screen support)
Re-organized some of the blocks
Some miscellaneous bug fixes
